block.p: WALSH--James. On April 11, 2007. Beloved Husband of Claire. Loving brother of Mary Schafer, Theresa Byrne, Anne Marie Mills and the late Michael. Also survived by many loving nieces and nephews. Longtime resident of Flushing and Fair Harbor Fire Island, NY. Visitation Saturday and Sunday 2-5, 7-9 pm at Quinn-Fogarty Funeral Home, 162 - 14 Sanford Avenue, Flushing, NY. Funeral Mass Monday, 10:45 am, St. Andrew Avellino Church. Interment Mt. St. Mary's.
